description: Tailor & Key presents for sale this beautiful rustic house located in the historic center of Chinchón.  A few meters from the Plaza Mayor and adjacent to the hermitage of San Roque. The house has been used as a habitual residence, but at various times it has been used for different purposes, in it period films, Renaissance documentary series, etc. have been shot. Due to the large number of useful meters and the distribution of its rooms allows a great variety of uses, such as restoration purposes (restaurant), as a rural house thanks to its spacious rooms and has a spectacular cave-cellar (renovated) with more 300 years old. The house is located in the historic center of Chinchón a few meters from the Plaza Mayor, the Ermita de San Roque and the Convent of the Clarisas. At Tailor & Key we are specialized in the residential market in Madrid. We offer a comprehensive and personalized service, accompanying our clients throughout the different phases of the real estate cycle, in purchase-sale, rental and comprehensive home renovation operations. Tailor & Key exclusively presents this spectacular rustic house located in the historic center of Chinchón, a few meters from the Plaza Mayor Located on a corner of Convento Street, it enjoys a patio of more than 230 m2, with the possibility of transforming it into a garden with a pool. The farm, completely isolated from outside views, has its typical Chinchón cave/cellar, partially renovated. The access to the house opens to a Hall with a square structure that distributes circulation to the different spaces. At the back, a large door invites us to go out to the bright and spacious outdoor patio. The house is distributed over three floors, with the different rooms occurring throughout the floor. On the first floor we find in the left wing, four bedrooms and a bathroom.All the residences are exterior. This wing is characterized by having an independent distributor that configures the space, as well as a viewpoint towards the patio. The right wing has a living room with fireplace and access to a second floor with an independent apartment with a bedroom, living room, bathroom and kitchen, attic and exterior. On the ground floor we find a majestic living room of more than 40 m2 with access to two rooms, one of them interior, currently configured as bedrooms. We find a separate bedroom on this floor, adjacent to a full bathroom. Also on the ground floor, independent of the life on the other side of the house, we find a living-dining room with a fireplace, rectangular and located facing the patio, as well as the large kitchen of the house with its pantry room. Outside, an attached construction finishes the space.It is a three-story building that has been half renovated., with façades and roofs arranged, hopes to be distributed to the taste of whoever returns to inhabit it. The cave/cellar, typical of the town houses of Chinchón, deserves your special attention for its distribution and possibilities.It is half renovated and has several independent rooms. It is also worth highlighting the two independent entrances it has and the large capacity of the lower patio that houses several parking spaces if you want. Rustic property with housing in Vega de Chinchón (Madrid), in a place called Dehesa de Villaverde. It is the sum of two cadastral plots, one of agricultural land (2,464 m²) and the other of urban land (1,222 m²). The latter contains a house. In total 3,686 m² of plot and 119 m² of housing. The house needs renovation and currently has two bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom. It has a small water tank on the roof and small solar panels for light. For this purpose it has batteries and appropriate installation. The plot has many adult trees: walnut trees, pear trees, almond trees, apple trees.. . It has a water well, a tool shed, barbecue, pool and removable pool with purifier. Currently the purchase cannot be financed through a mortgage loan.

Half an hour from Madrid, you will find this oasis of nature, in a privileged enclave. Large exclusive apartment a few meters from the Plaza Mayor of Chinchón (Madrid). Exterior, with three windows facing Grande Street and one facing Emiliano Montero Street. It has stops for several bus lines that connect you with Madrid city and the different towns in the area. Chinchón is declared a historical-artistic site and has an important gastronomic and cultural offer.

Country house with a special charm within a small farm of 10 hectares. Very close to Chinchón and only 40 minutes from Madrid. The house is reached by a path lined with cypresses that opens onto a terrace with the entrance to the house in the middle. A beautiful metal door, an exotic entrance hall and a magnificent wooden door welcome you. Two rooms serve as a hall with different environments before moving on to the living room and dining room. The kitchen is large with an office space and another for ironing and washing machine. Two different stairs, one of them wrought iron, give access to the upper floor. Here we find a wonderful living room with balconies and a small office. From here there is access to the main room, with a dressing room and bathroom. We also find 3 other rooms that share 2 bathrooms. These 3 rooms open onto a large terrace overlooking the green garden. At the end of the corridor there is another small room with a bathroom and another room. All the rooms are big. In front of the main entrance and passing through the halls, there is access to a splendid porch with 3 gatherings and a fireplace from where you can enjoy the magnificent garden full of greenery, trees, a fountain and paths that lead to the guest house and the pool. The garden is designed with art and is beautiful. The guest house consists of 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchen and two living rooms. The pool is paved around with mud and grass. In the background, a beautiful hedge and several cypresses make the pool area a special and peaceful place. In addition there are two other small buildings, an orchard and fruit trees in the fenced area around the house. This area has automatic irrigation. We found a trellis to park the cars on one side of the house. The other 9 hectares that surround the house are farmed and irrigated with a water concession from the Tagus Hydrographic Confederation. All these characteristics make the place the perfect place to rest on weekends or to develop a new crop or livestock business (horses, for example). The house is decorated with exquisite and very special taste. The furniture is not included in the sale but it could be studied. You can enjoy good excursions being very close to Chinchón and Aranjuez, and other towns where you can taste Madrid recipes in their restaurants.

Wonderful property with swimming pool in Chinchon Engel & Volkers presents this wonderful property of almost 24.500 square metres of land, in the Valgrande urbanisation, very close to Morata de Tajuña. The property has 3 residential buildings. The main one with 422 square metres built, an independent studio of 70 square metres and a house, currently for caretakers, of 105 square metres.  The main house is large, its architecture makes it feel big from the inside and the outside is integrated with the land. It has two large main living rooms and a dining room with high ceilings and a skylight in the roof, all of them with access to the terraces. The kitchen is spacious, with dining area and fireplace. It has access to a service bedroom, a pantry, inner courtyard laundry and a bathroom. The 5 main bedrooms are all en-suite bedrooms with bathrooms. The largest one has a large living room with fireplace and direct access to the garden. In the lower part of this main building there is a cellar distributed in 3 spaces, 2 cellars and a dressing room. The studio house has a trapezoidal design with a study room, a bedroom with a fireplace and a bathroom. The third house, the caretakers' house, consists of 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom. The property has other constructions which are used as garages/storage rooms. The swimming pool is located on one side of the plot where you can appreciate the height with infinite views. Valgrande is an urbanisation focused on horses: at the entrance we can find a stable that has integrated an old hermitage. The vast majority of the estates there have their own stables. The municipality of Morata de Tajuña is located on the lower course of the river Tajuña, 35 km southeast of the city of Madrid. The fulling mills, mills, washing places and fountains that abound in this town tell us of its connection with water. Morata is located in the tourist area of Madrid in the Comarca de las Vegas. The best way to reach the municipality from Madrid is to take the A-3 motorway from Valencia and take the exit 21 'Morata - Chinchón', which links up with the M-311 to reach the town. In terms of public transport, the best way to get to Morata de Tajuña is by bus. It can be taken from the Plaza del Conde de Casal square in Madrid. The frequency of the bus lines that go to the town, 337 and 336, is 15 minutes during rush hour and 30 minutes during the rest of the day on weekdays. On public holidays, buses run in both directions with a frequency of one hour. In addition, the municipality is connected to Rivas-Vaciamadrid, Arganda del Rey and Perales de Tajuña thanks to line 330.

Huspy presents comfort in this charming three-story villa in Chinchón, Madrid. The semi-basement houses a spacious garage with automatic doors, a cellar, a full bathroom and versatile areas ideal for different uses. The first floor is the living area with a bright kitchen that connects to a charming terrace, a spacious living room, a games room, a toilet, an additional garage, an office, a pantry and a boiler room. The second floor is the refuge of the bedrooms, which includes an impressive suite with a dressing room, a bathroom with a bathtub and a hydromassage cabin, and an office or gym. In addition, three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and two full bathrooms. Underfloor heating, aluminum windows with thermal break and unbeatable views complete this gem. Built in 2003, this villa stands out for its construction quality and offers a garden, storage room and garage. A unique opportunity to live in style in Chinchón!

Discover your equestrian paradise in the heart of Paraje de Valgrande (Chinchón)! We present you a gem for horse lovers, a recreational estate that combines nature, design and tranquility. In this 6,700m2 property, you will enjoy endless views of the majestic landscape that waters the Tajuña River. The farm has an impressive constructed area of 740m2, strategically distributed to offer you a unique experience. The 320m2 main house, located on one floor, is organized around a charming rustic patio with a fountain. Its large windows in the large living room offer views of the porch and the lush garden. The central fireplace creates a cozy atmosphere for family and guests, and the loft area is perfect for a library or office. The day area includes a kitchen with access to the cellar and a cozy dining room with a fireplace. In the sleeping area, three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and dressing rooms provide privacy and comfort. The master bedroom has direct access to the garden through a small porch. The home also has a separate guest area with its own bedroom and full bathroom. The amenities do not end here: the property has a wine cellar, caretaker's house, spa area with sauna, jacuzzi, toilets and changing rooms, heated pool with saline chlorination, gazebo, various storage rooms and equestrian facilities with a stable and dressage area. In addition, you will enjoy ample parking for more than 10 vehicles. The general characteristics of the home, such as underfloor heating, solid wood in interior and exterior enclosures, marble in bathrooms and its excellent state of conservation, guarantee a lifestyle of luxury and comfort. Immerse yourself in this oasis, surrounded by a consolidated olive grove and unobstructed views. Relax in the jacuzzi while contemplating the nature around you, enjoy summer days in the heated pool and dine under the starlight. No fees are charged to the purchasing party. In addition, we have plans, videos and a virtual tour. Don't miss this unique opportunity to acquire an exceptional property. Contact us now for more information and to schedule a visit!

Historic building dating from 1736 that was used as a farmhouse.Thirty years before Felipe V, in 1706, our first Bourbon King was acclaimed King for the first time in Spain in the Plaza de Chinchón. The building retains numerous original construction elements that give its architecture a bright and welcoming old rural atmosphere as well as being extremely quiet, while at the same time bringing together today's comfort. Living in Chinchón you will not only enjoy a peaceful life typical of small cities, but you will also be able to boast of living in one of the most beautiful towns in Spain, also considering its Plaza Mayor as one of the most beautiful in the world. . The municipality is also only 60km from the capital of Madrid. The very facade of the house and its access porch already emanates centuries of history behind it.Without a doubt, it is a unique home in which peace and harmony are breathed from the first steps of access to it through its century-old door. The house has been recently refurbished by changing all the floors in it, installing a heating system with convection radiators using Natural Gas. In the same way and even more importantly, all door and window frames have been replaced by 100% PVC carpentry from the REHAU brand, which have the most innovative technology in line with the technological advances of modern society.Which will make you enjoy great thermal insulation that will allow you to minimize heat or cold losses, achieving great energy savings.They also provide much greater sound insulation than other types of windows. Its outdoor space of more than 100m2 will allow you to design a Castilian patio, typically from La Mancha. A home where you can enjoy every day, or as a second residence due to its proximity to Madrid. To visit this beautiful home, contact us and we will gladly provide you with all the information you need. We speak Spanish, English, Russian and Ukrainian. Arrangement of visits at least 24/48 hours in advance. In the event that there are two or more clients interested in the property, the highest economic offer will be taken into account, conditional on the choice and acceptance of the property.Even if the aforementioned offer is above the price set in this announcement.

The house has features that make it even more attractive.It is exterior and offers views of a community area, which will allow you to enjoy a quiet and pleasant environment.The double glazed windows are made of wood and have shutters to regulate the entry of sunlight.It is important to note that furniture is not included in the sale. As for comfort, the house has gas heating by radiators, which will keep you warm during the coldest months of the year.The doors are also made of wood, providing a classic and elegant touch to the whole. The amenities do not end here: the property has a wine cellar, caretaker's house, spa area with sauna, jacuzzi, toilets and changing rooms, heated pool with saline chlorination, gazebo, various storage rooms and equestrian facilities with a stable and dressage area. The farm also has two warehouses for boilers, agricultural material, etc. It also has a covered parking space for four cars. The farm has a lot of water as it is in an irrigated area.

This stunning property is located in Chinchón with almost 3 hectares of land located in a private urbanization surrounded by similar properties and a countryside offering privacy and tranquility. A beautiful path surrounded by cypresses leads us to the top of a hill where the property is located surrounded by more cypresses, pine trees, olive trees and with a wide and clear view of the surrounding countryside reminiscent of Tuscany. The main house consists of 622m² and is distributed over two comfortable floors and an attic. Built with excellent materials and in perfect condition. As soon as you enter in the spacious hall you are greeted by an elegant and magnificent natural stone staircase that divides the house into two symmetrical parts.  On the left wing of the house and on the main floor is the spacious and luminous living-dining room, fireplace, with double height ceilings that give a great sensation of spaciousness receiving the light from both its windows and a large window on the upper floor, annexed to the lounge we have an office-library and on the right wing of the floor there is a cosy, luminous and spacious kitchen-office with a wonderful fireplace making it a pleasant area for family life, next to the kitchen there is a laundry and ironing room and a pantry, this main floor is completed by a spacious bedroom with bathroom en suite, as well as a guest toilet in the hall, from where the elegant staircase leads to the first floor in which a library-living room open to the main floor lounge dividing into the two wings of the bedrooms, in one of them we have a large master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite which can also be accessed from the corridor to serve the other two bedrooms in this area.  On the opposite side we can find two large bedrooms that share a bathroom and the staircase that goes up to the attic where there is a living room that can be used as a guest room since it also has a bathroom.  The property also has a separate house with a living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom that can be used as a guest or caretaker's house. It also has a studio-apartment which consists of a living room, 2 rooms and a complete bathroom. It also has another building where there is a large workshop with a storage room and the installation room. The house is surrounded by a beautiful and well cared garden with a wonderful swimming pool with clear views. In short, a fantastic property 30 minutes from Madrid where you can enjoy peace and privacy in an idyllic setting.  Chinchón is one of the most picturesque and best known towns within the autonomous region of Madrid and the fact that it lies very close to the capital city has not impinged on its conserving its own personality, with its dark gray and ochre colored landscapes, several houses grouped upon hills surrounding its unique main square and its winding streets that are a witness to the life and the history of the village.

WG50371-AM Forty minutes from the city of Madrid, close to the town of Chinchón, this quiet and comfortable property is located, designed by a prominent Spanish architect, by Martín Chirino, with a history and attributes that make it a unique opportunity. in the market. Built based on the requirements of the Spanish sculptor, it was designed for the comfort of its inhabitants, their family and friends, maintaining many of its qualities that its new owner will be able to enjoy.First, privacy plays an important point in the location of the property, rising in the middle of an urbanization where the green fields and vineyards predominate, a few minutes from the center of Madrid; second, the tranquility that the artist needed to work made him choose this place where there are no immediate neighbors; third, the chalet follows logic of symmetry, which the sculptor used in his works; and fourth, we cannot fail to mention the quality of the materials and the personalized work of Chinchón artisans to achieve what the artist wanted. The property is divided into two main buildings: the main house; and a second construction, which includes; two independent apartments, a shed, cellar and garage. CHARACTERISTICS OF THE MAIN HOUSE: The property has 730 m2.Among its qualities we can see 3 meter high ceilings, pine wood doors designed by the sculptor and worked by artisans from Chinchón; Apiary stone floors, rustic or worked, depending on the area. - Entrance with vehicle access at the door. - Entrance hall, in front of the main staircase. - Large living room and dining room, plus a second living room/library. - Independent, equipped kitchen. - Pantry and separate ironing room. - 1 large bedroom with en-suite bathroom, on the ground floor. - 5 rooms on the first floor, two en suite. - 1 additional bathroom. - Two floating iron hallways, with bookcases. - 1 attic, with en-suite bathroom. The garden is beautiful with magnificent trees, flower beds, fountains and automatic irrigation. It has a good swimming pool with changing room, shower and area to sit and eat and a vegetable garden. The farm has 2 houses: the main one and the guest house. The Main House was renovated in 2002 and has 2 floors with a total of 700m2. Ground floor: beautiful entrance hall that is accessed through an avenue of cypresses, with carved doors, which gives access to another hallway through which at the back you reach the porch. Large living room with fireplace with 3 rooms and windows overlooking the garden. Guest bathroom. Separate dining room and a beautiful kitchen with a dining room, pantry, laundry area and a refrigerator room. The porch is wonderful with a fireplace and fans with 3 different gatherings overlooking the garden full of trees and flowers. On this floor is also the guards' house, which consists of an en-suite room, living room and kitchen. Upper floor: from the living room you access the upper floor where we find another very pleasant living room with balconies overlooking the garden, fireplace and small office with refrigerator and sink. From this living room you access the main room, which also has balconies overlooking the garden, all with mosquito nets, a wonderful dressing room and a large bathroom that has a very pleasant private terrace. It also has 3 other rooms with access to a terrace overlooking the garden that share 2 bathrooms. Another en-suite room with a living room. The heating is with a gas boiler and has air conditioning through ducts. The house has very good qualities with ceilings with exposed beams, very beautiful carved doors, windows with mosquito nets and bars, clay floors, all in very good condition and very well cared for. The guest house has 165m2 with 2 living rooms with access to a good porch, a large kitchen and 4 bedrooms that share 2 bathrooms. The farm also has 2 warehouses for boilers, agricultural materials, etc. It also has a covered parking space for 4 cars. The farm has a lot of water as it is in an irrigated area. ***A significant percentage of our properties are not published in idealista due to the express wish of the owners.
